description.@en: Conjuring forth multiple silhouettes of illusory knives, they are instantly hurled towards your enemies.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, select a number of foes equal to your [WB]. Providing you can see your foes, each foe suffers [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in mental Peril. Regardless, the actual casting of Umbral Knives is never apparent to anyone, perfectly disguised.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above and it also immediately triggers any Disorders your foes may be suffering from.

criticalFailure.@en: The dirk drops immediately at your feet, twisting into a single screw and burying itself hundreds of yards beneath the earth. It is lost forever. You immediately suffer [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in mental Peril. It also triggers any Disorders you may be suffering from.

reagents.@en: One castle-forged dirk, held before you
